EmailTemplate.description: This is used to send notification when appointment is created for patient
EmailTemplate.name: Patient appointment notification template
EmailTemplate.subject: Appointment Booked
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi, Your appointment has been booked with {!Appointment__c.Patient__c} on {!Appointment__c.00N7F00000Tl4cC} . Reference number is {!Appointment__c.Name}
